entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
